Reviews.Title: Cheap phone, you get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: Mr. Chang
Reviews.Content: You can ask too much for a US$ 89.99 phone...The good:* Android 4.2, feel like a higher price phone, comes with screen protector and cover* Unlocked phone* 2 sims (I don't want to carry 2 phones)* Good sound* Fast  wi-fi* Google Play* 3G (1 Slot)* You can select which sim makes calls, send sms, access dataThe bad:* Does not sync contacts from gmail, I have to export a vcard from gmail to sd card, insert it in the phone  and import  them* Small Memory (Ram and Rom), I  just installed Facebook, Whatsapp, Tango, Youtube, speedtest, that's all memory full* Touchscreen becomes unresponsive sometimes, also you can touch and icon and it senses you touch another one (sometimes)* The phone recognizes some sims in both slots (3g, 2g), some sims are not recognized in one slot (3g)* You have to set APN manually to access data* Small resolution front and back camera* Poor resolution screen

Reviews.Title: It works great overseas
Reviews.Author: Julio Londono
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to use it outside the USA, and because of that I give it 5 stars. I travelled to Colombia, popped in an old prepaid Comcel SIM card and it worked right away, I even enabled a data prepaid plan and I was able to surf the web and use applications like Tappsi, maps, Whatsup, Skype, etc. GPS applications with free maps work great without the need of celular signal and Waze works fine with the data plan, you can even share the internet to your regular phone or other devices using the hot-spot feature.It benefits from the Android operating system and for its price this is the best travel phone ever.Now if you want to use this as a primary personal phone, remember the price you are paying for it, it is not a Samsung Galaxy neither it is an iPhone, the processor is a bit slow and the camera is quite poor, so to put it in perspective it costs less than one fifth of the price of a galaxy or an iphone, so you get one fifth the processor power and one fifth the picture sharpness of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Works Well!
Reviews.Author: Silver_tea
Reviews.Content: This is not a top line phone...so don't expect an iPhone quality....however...I bought two for my daughters(teens) and it works nicely for them...this way if it becomes lost or damaged...I don't pay out of the wazooo to buy a new phone. All features work well and it can receive internet. The voice quality lacks...other than that it's a good phone for the price.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT EQUIPMENT
Reviews.Author: PEDRO MARQUEZ
Reviews.Content: Excellent equipment, lines and quick connect wifi. What also apps, good responsiveness. Team with excellent ergonico and lightweight design. I recommend it I have no objection to this product. Exellent!

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Cubot C9+ Dual Core 4.0 inch Android 4.2 Smartphone Dual SIM Dual
Reviews.Author: Ben Harrell
Reviews.Content: I love the phone the only thing is when you are typing the keypad will cut off. that is the only problem.

Reviews.Title: The Red Cubot C9+ Dual Core 4.0 inch Android 4.2 Smartphone Dual SIM Dual Standby Fashion Cellphone MTK6572 Mobile Phone
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: The equipment is excellent. I can quickly connect to wifi. The default apps are reassuring and enjoyable. I can also download other applications on it.  It has a very good display and the touch screen is better. This is the phone I want to give as a present to my niece.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Chantele Belamour
Reviews.Content: Phone has worked great so far, it was a nice price for a touchscreen phone and came with a micro sd card.transfering it to my phone carrier was easy enough so i believe its worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Miguel S.
Reviews.Content: I think an excellent phone, internet good coverage and good pictures despite having few megapix I fully recommend and use in Venezuela and works well with all operators

Reviews.Title: Excelente.
Reviews.Author: Ricardo De Angelis
Reviews.Content: Nice phone, it works great on Venezuela. 100% granted if you want a midle gama phone with nice standard specifications.

Reviews.Title: ok phone
Reviews.Author: Alhagie Jallow
Reviews.Content: its not perfect but it is good enough to use until you can save enough to buy something better! like, i dunno, an iphone!

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: robert villa
Reviews.Content: its ok for the price, you can a better cubot phone though, check their website for more info on the specs and diferent models

Reviews.Title: This product is worse than vertically-perforated bathroom tissues!
Reviews.Author: Red Molina
Reviews.Content: For its price, I knew I was risking my money. It was a bet and I lost. I did not put as many apps as I would like to and kept its use to the minimum. Despite of this, to my surprise, the screen gave out two days AFTER Amazon's return deadline. A perfectly timed highway robbery. And I don't know if it can still be repaired. Well, as it appears, this product is best before 33 days of use. Lessons learned. Never choose price over brand names. Remember, even if most products are already made in China, brand names will never risk their reputation. Even if you have to pay a little more, do so. Choose brands that have been tried and tested. And you will be safe. THEREFORE, DON'T EVEN THINK OF BUYING THIS GARBAGE FROM CUBOT--- WHO?

Reviews.Title: its alright
Reviews.Author: mathew blom
Reviews.Content: The phone is not what I was expecting. The camera is really nice. But the phone is slow. And if wit straight talk the  phone Has to be att or t mobile. BT over all not bad.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Juan Ignacio Iuvaro
Reviews.Content: Although it don't have much RAM memory is fine to use several apps.With Facebook, whatsapp, skype and a couple of games works ok.Very good display and the touch screen is good also.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: raquel benitez
Reviews.Content: hi! I got my cellphone already. its dual sim and looks like an I phone but its really affordable for this type of phone.Thank you very much And I will still keep buying products in amazon

Reviews.Title: The phone came damaged
Reviews.Author: cira elena borjas
Reviews.Content: Just turned on the phone screen has some scratches and has a lot of distortion, the image on the screen looks dull, very dull, distinguishes nothing. I would like to know how we would do and I made the purchase from Caracas Venezuela. Thanks in advance for your prompt response.

Reviews.Title: Nice look, but software an camera are low quality! quality!
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: Previously owned a motorola atrix2 loved the phone only reason I purchased this phone was because the pixels in the screen went out due to me dropping it. woops . The cubot is a cheap yet cool looking phone your better off spending $200 on a upgraded unlocked cubot phone that has more camera quality an faster software plus more RAM/memory. The cubot C9W works yeah, but lags alot an memory us used up w FB an a couple other apps installed . Weak memory. The cameras are both low quality an the flash doesnt help at all. Used this phone for a month then switched back to my Motorola atrix2...way better quality.

Reviews.Title: good but still needs improvements
Reviews.Author: Georgette
Reviews.Content: This phone is very good, i can download many applications on it, but there are still improvements to do, the wallpaper settings need to be reexamined.but i like it so far!! Good phone

Reviews.Title: wasted $$$$!!!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Davis
Reviews.Content: Said it was unlocked but couldn't use it with my carrier so I wasted 100 $$ for nothing thanks amazon not really

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: louis mekhaeil
Reviews.Content: I tried to work with it but it is bad no connection with any body it need some one to fix it.

Reviews.Title: What a waste of money
Reviews.Author: Desiree
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and it worked for about a week then stopped it is really cheap and its falling apart all the paint is just lifting off how i regret this purchase.

Reviews.Title: this phone does not work
Reviews.Author: Samari
Reviews.Content: I tried to hook it up on ata&t; and it did not work I want my money back or a new phone ..I spent my money on it and it doesn't workI tried calling the company that sells then but they don't have number ..pieces of junk

Reviews.Title: wrong color
Reviews.Author: fait
Reviews.Content: I got the phone in awesome time but the color was orange and I ordered RED UGH.... I don't even like orange

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 4.2 OS: This Android mobile phone is a brilliantly constructed piece of hardware merged with the Google Android 4.2 OS to provide end users with amazing modern day functionality on the go for their daily communication and entertainment needs.
Dual SIM: This phone comes with Dual SIM technology, allowing you to switch easily between two SIM cards/phone numbers without having to physically take them out and swap them over-saving you time and hassle.
Bluetooth: Another feature of this great cell phone is its Bluetooth capability. Bluetooth allows the phone to communicate without devices, such as hands free headsets, wirelessly-a great solution for people constantly on the move. It also provides a safe and easy way to have a phone conversation while driving.
Quad Band:This phone is unlocked for worldwide use. The phone supportsGSM850/900/1800/1900, 3G: WCDMA 850/2100MHz MHz. Enjoy worry-free travel wherever you go.
GPS: Never get lost again! Use the GPS function to find out where you are, any time. This system features the latest in GPS technology to keep you on track.
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked Cubot C9W Dual Core 4.0 inch Android 4.2 Smartphone Dual SIM Dual Standby Fashion Cellphone MTK6572 Mobile Phone (Blue-3G Version)
